author: SAPO
title: Trabalhadores da Boeing em Seattle aprovam greve - Atualidade - SAPO.pt - Última hora e notícias de hoje atualizadas ao minuto
text:
Lusa 13 set 2024 07:27 Atualidade Partilhar Partilhar Partilhar Partilhar Partilhar Trabalhadores da Boeing em Seattle aprovam greve Os trabalhadores da Boeing na zona de Seattle, na costa oeste dos Estados Unidos, aprovaram uma greve, rejeitando um novo contrato proposto pela construtora aeronáutica norte-americana, anunciou o sindicato.
Os trabalhadores votaram 96% a favor da greve, disse o presidente do sindicato dos maquinistas IAM-Distrito 751, Jon Holden.
"Vamos entrar em greve à meia-noite" locais (08:00 em Lisboa), acrescentou.
A paralisação vai abranger cerca de 33 mil trabalhadores da montagem de aviões, a maioria dos quais na zona de Seattle, levando à suspensão da produção dos aviões mais vendidos da empresa.
Os membros da Associação Internacional de Maquinistas e Trabalhadores Aeroespaciais votaram sobre uma proposta de contrato que inclui aumentos salariais de 25% em quatro anos.
A greve não deverá causar cancelamentos de voos nem afetará diretamente os passageiros das companhias aéreas, mas será mais um golpe para a reputação e as finanças da Boeing, num ano marcado por problemas nas operações aéreas, de defesa e espaciais.
EJ // VQ
Lusa/Fim

Tribunal rejeita pedidos de Trump para fim da ordem de silêncio no caso do encobrimento de escândalo sexual

author: Maileena Faaita
title: What They're Saying: Broncos 'can't speak highly enough' of Maxx Crosby
text: The Raiders will be hosting the Denver Broncos for their Week 18 season finale. Take a look at what Broncos' players and coaches are saying leading up to kickoff. On Interim Head Coach Antonio Pierce: "I would say this to his credit, man he was a tough player. I remember him well. We had some good battles with the Giants teams. There's a grit and toughness you see with how they're playing both on defense and certainly on offense, their running game. He obviously has a rich history with that tradition and I think he's done a really good job. That's a credit not only to him, but his staff and his team. But you see it on film, you feel it." - Denver Broncos Head Coach Sean Payton On the Raiders defense: "This team we're playing, I would say is a real good red zone third-down defense. ... They are in the top 10." - Denver Broncos Head Coach Sean Payton On DE Maxx Crosby: "The challenge with him is, I said this the other day, these traits where he's an exceptional athlete. He bends really well so, it's hard to stay on him. He can get off a block very quickly. He's highly intelligent. So, you see him in a stance waiting, he obviously understands where the backs are. The other thing is his stamina is unique. I mean, I don't have the exacts but he's playing close to 98 or 99 percent and when you look at play 67 it's the same as play eight, that's rare. ... He plays over on the right, but he plays on the left. They move him around too, but he's something." - Denver Broncos Head Coach Sean Payton "I can't speak highly enough of this guy. Being with him every day for a year, seeing how he works. The most impressive thing is, I don't know if I've ever seen a player play that hard for that long every single time he's out on the field. He's going to bring it. We're going to have to be ready. He's one of the best in the league for a reason." - Denver Broncos QB Jarrett Stidham As the Raiders prepare to host the Denver Broncos at Allegiant Stadium, view past matchups of the Silver and Black hosting their division rival.

author: Indiablooms
title: ULFA to be disbanded, Amit Shah announces signing 'historic peace deal' with insurgent group, Assam govt | Indiablooms - First Portal on Digital News Management
text: ULFA to be disbanded, Amit Shah announces signing 'historic peace deal' with insurgent group, Assam govt New Delhi/IBNS: A tripartite peace deal was signed in Delhi on Friday between the Centre, the Assam government, and the United Liberation Front of Asom (ULFA) in which the insurgent group in the northeast agreed to abjure the path of violence. The ULFA (Independent) faction led by Paresh Baruah remains opposed to talks. The peace deal with the oldest insurgent group of Assam attempts to address issues such as illegal immigration, land rights for indigenous communities, and a financial package for Assam's development. Home Minister Amit Shah told reporters in Delhi that the Centre will ensure to look into all the reasonable demands by ULFA and will try to meet those in a time-bound manner. ULFA the oldest insurgent group of Assam agreed to abjure the path of violence. Speaking on the signing of a memorandum of settlement with ULFA.— Amit Shah (@AmitShah) [https://t.co/6H1DIHmmHy] [December 29, 2023] He announced that ULFA as an organisation would stand disbanded. "We want to assure the ULFA leadership that their trust in the Centre to ensure the success of the peace process will be honoured," Shah said, and credited Prime Minister Narendra Modi for bringing peace and stability to the northeast. Shah said the removal of the Armed Forces (Special) Powers Act (AFSPA) from many areas of Assam and other northeast states is a testament that insurgency is nearly extinct in the region. A historic day for Assam.— Amit Shah (@AmitShah) Fulfilling PM [@narendramodi]Ji's vision for a prosperous, peaceful and developed Northeast, today we have arrived at a landmark resolution to the ULFA insurgency problem of Assam. The Government of India and the Government of Assam have signed a… [pic.twitter.com/bWVOnEKOdo] [December 29, 2023] Assam Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma, who sat beside Shah, said the peace deal with ULFA will solve the problem of insurgency in the region to a large extent. Founded on April 7, 1979, in Sivasagar, Assam, ULFA emerged to establish an independent sovereign state for the indigenous Assamese people. The group began its armed operations in the late 1980s, led by figures such as Paresh Baruah, Arabinda Rajkhowa, and Anup Chetia. [ULFA to be disbanded, Amit Shah announces signing 'historic peace deal' with insurgent group, Assam govt](https://www.indiablooms.com/news-details/N/94006/ulfa-to-be-disbanded-amit-shah-announces-signing-historic-peace-deal-with-insurgent-group-assam-govt.html)Fri, Dec 29 2023 [PM Modi to inaugurate Ayodhya airport tomorrow, Air India Express expands ops to this pilgrim city](https://www.indiablooms.com/news-details/N/94004/pm-modi-to-inaugurate-ayodhya-airport-tomorrow-air-india-express-expands-ops-to-this-pilgrim-city.html)Fri, Dec 29 2023 [Miscreants loot over Rs.14 lakh from Banki branch of Central Cooperative Bank in Odisha](https://www.indiablooms.com/news-details/N/94003/miscreants-loot-over-rs-14-lakh-from-banki-branch-of-central-cooperative-bank-in-odisha.html)Fri, Dec 29 2023 [India requests Pakistan to extradite 2008 Mumbai terror attack mastermind Hafiz Saeed: MEA](https://www.indiablooms.com/news-details/N/94002/india-requests-pakistan-to-extradite-2008-mumbai-terror-attack-mastermind-hafiz-saeed-mea.html)Fri, Dec 29 2023 [Dalit woman hacked to death over petty dispute in Hardoi](https://www.indiablooms.com/news-details/N/94000/dalit-woman-hacked-to-death-over-petty-dispute-in-hardoi.html)Fri, Dec 29 2023 [Designs of Indian Navy's new epaulettes for top-ranked officers draw inspiration from Shivaji](https://www.indiablooms.com/news-details/N/93999/designs-of-indian-navy-s-new-epaulettes-for-top-ranked-officers-draw-inspiration-from-shivaji.html)Fri, Dec 29 2023 [Former cricketer Ambati Rayudu joins Jagan Mohan Reddy's YSRCP](https://www.indiablooms.com/news-details/N/93995/former-cricketer-ambati-rayudu-joins-jagan-mohan-reddy-s-ysrcp.html)Fri, Dec 29 2023 [Uttar Pradesh: Dalit man killed over minor dispute in Hardoi](https://www.indiablooms.com/news-details/N/93994/uttar-pradesh-dalit-man-killed-over-minor-dispute-in-hardoi.html)Fri, Dec 29 2023

author: Emilio Contreras
title: Ganador francés de "The Voice" herido con arma de fuego reconoce que intentada "simular un suicidio" | Artes y Cultura | BioBioChile
text:
El popular cantante francés Kendji Girac , que resultó herido grave de bala en la madrugada de lunes, declaró que se disparó intentando simular un suicidio para asustar a su esposa.
La información la dio a conocer hoy el fiscal que lleva el caso, Olivier Janson, en una conferencia en Mont de Marsan (sureste de Francia). El hecho, ha generado interés en el país galo por la popularidad del intérprete y lo inverosímil del incidente.
Girac, de 27 años, dijo inicialmente en el hospital que se disparó por accidente intentando manejar el arma en plena madrugada, pero el fiscal afirmó hoy que, tras reconstruir el ángulo del disparo en la caravana donde vive la familia, los investigadores concluyeron que esa versión “es imposible” y que otro autor “no era compatible”.
Por ello, y tras analizar mensajes telefónicos entre la pareja, confrontaron al cantante de nuevo, que reconoció que durante una discusión con su mujer, Soraya Miranda , intentó “simular un suicidio” para “asustarla”. También reconoció que esa noche había consumido alcohol y drogas . Lee también... Ganador francés de "The Voice" resulta herido en confuso incidente tras manipular arma de fuego Martes 23 Abril, 2024 | 14:00
Janson añadió que, aunque Girac ha declarado que “lamenta enormemente” lo ocurrido, la investigación sigue abierta por “intento de homicidio voluntario” aunque seguramente terminará siendo archivada.
También dijo que el cantante ha sufrido lesiones en un pulmón, lo que le ocasiona problemas para respirar, por lo que necesitará “varios meses” hasta una recuperación completa.
El cantante debía actuar mañana en Marsella , dentro de los festejos por la llegada de la llama olímpica a esa ciudad el 8 de mayo, pero será sustituido por los Gipsy Kings . Kendji Girac y la verdad de su incidente
El incidente ocurrió en una caravana en un área de acogida de personas nómadas en Biscarrosse, en las Landas, a unos 150 kilómetros de la frontera con España. El cantante, a pesar de su éxito, no ha abandonado el modo de vida tradicional de su familia gitana .
Hijo de una familia gitana de origen catalán, Girac (cuyo verdadero nombre es Kendji Jason Maillé) se hizo conocido por sus interpretaciones en redes sociales antes de participar en la tercera temporada del concurso televisivo ‘The Voice’, de la que se alzó vencedor en 2014 .
Allí comenzó su carrera discográfica, con un primer tema en francés y español titulado ‘Color Gitano’ (2014), que luego formaría parte de su primer álbum, ‘Kendji’ .
El disco, el segundo más vendido en Francia ese año, recibió varios premios y consolidó al intérprete en el panorama musical francés, con temas como ‘Andalouse’ o ‘Bella’ .
La carrera de Girac acumula ya cinco álbumes de larga duración, el último de ellos publicado en diciembre de 2022, y en conjunto acumulan ventas de varios millones de unidades.

author: Valley City Times-Record
title: Studio Khora: Reinventing Long Island’s Landscape with Sustainable Elegance | User | times-online.com
text: Nestled amidst the emerald embrace of Long Island, Studio Khora rises as an exemplar of architectural alchemy, transforming modernist tenets into contemporary masterpieces. The Pavilion house is a beacon of sustainable living, mirrors the ethos of top Long Island architects , marrying innovation with environmental stewardship. In an age where sustainability is not just a choice but a necessity, Studio Khora's design is a clarion call for the future of New York and Long Island's residential landscape. Studio Khora, distinguished among Long Island architects, has sculpted a space that resonates with Mies van der Rohe's minimalist spirit while speaking the complex visual language of Derrida's deconstruction. Here, form and function engage in a delicate dance, creating a living experience that transcends the confines of traditional architecture. This house is not a mere dwelling but a vessel of light and air, a canvas where nature's palette unfurls in splendor. The architectural language of this Long Island jewel is a dialogue of contrasts, where Mies’s transparent simplicity meets the intricate layers of Derrida's philosophy. Studio Khora has adeptly translated these dialogues into a home that stands as a manifesto of fluidity, with glass expanses inviting the outside in, fostering a seamless bond with the land. In this space, contemplation and connection flourish, nurtured by the tranquil cadence of coastal life. The narrative crafted by Studio Khora goes beyond aesthetic allure; it's an urgent response to the climatic challenges facing New York and Long Island. The house's sustainable blueprint is a testament to the firm's commitment to ecological integrity, featuring renewable resources, energy-efficient solutions, and a symbiotic relationship with its environment. This approach not only minimizes the ecological footprint but also sets a benchmark for comfort and elegance. In this Long Island haven, sustainability is not an afterthought but the cornerstone of its creation. Studio Khora has reimagined the essence of coastal living, proving that luxury and environmental consciousness can coexist. The house's design is a bold step towards a greener, more resilient New York, where each structure not only shelters but also preserves and inspires. ABOUT STUDIO KHORA [STUDIO KHORA ] is a multidisciplinary design collaborative of visionary architects, lighting and interior designers, landscape architects, and builders engaged to deconstruct the traditional patterns of spatial design. To see forward. We work as one with the most discerning residential and commercial clientele to sculpt contemporary architecture, interiors, furnishings, and landscapes within the world’s most extraordinary coastal settings. Together, we seek to re-envision architecture as contemporary art. author: Madison Myers
title: McGregor residents and businesses brace for planned power outages
text:
MCGREGOR, Texas — McGregor residents and businesses are struggling with frequent power outages, especially after severe weather events. A planned power outage is scheduled for Thursday night.
McGregor has been experiencing frequent power outages, impacting both residents and local businesses. A planned power outage is scheduled for Thursday night to complete necessary repairs. Local businesses, like The Coffee Shop and Old Fashioned Meat Market, are preparing for the outage to minimize disruptions. BROADCAST TRANSCRIPT:
“We actually have a lot of power outages and they are unprepared for,” a server at The Coffee Shop in McGregor, Pamela Patterson said.
Tuesday morning and afternoon, there were more than 14,000 reports of weather-related power outages in McLennan County.
Something affecting both residents and local businesses.
“ We had to close down for a whole day, so we lost some businesses, but we made it through,” the Owner of Old Fashioned Meat Market, Steven Estrada, said.
“Yesterday morning it went out right after 6:00 a.m. and didn’t come back until 4:30, which we did not think would be that late,” Patterson said.
25 News stopped by a local coffee shop to see how they’ve been dealing with the outages, which they say happen often.
“ This always happens in the bad weather. Anytime the wind gets up or a storm comes through, we have quite a few power outages,” Patterson said.
But Tuesday is not the end of our community’s power outage. The city made a post to Facebook, informing neighbors that there is a planned power outage from 12:00 a.m. to 3:00 a.m. Thursday night.
This will give neighbors like Steven Estrada, the owner of a local meat market, a chance to prepare—once again.
“Since we know what to do, we'll get ready tonight. I’ll turn the trailer on, get prepared, pull everything out, and put it in the refrigerator unit, and we will save our stuff again. I’m getting ready,” Estrada said.
Our neighbors at the coffee shop are also making preparations.
“You get a big pan and ice it and then place the food in it,” Patterson said.
But no amount of work can make up for the loss of business.
“Being closed for an entire day affects our sales in many ways and customers get upset,” said The Coffee Shop General Manager Lindsey Whiteside.
25 News received this statement from Oncor saying:
Oncor has identified additional necessary repairs to the equipment that helps deliver power to the McGregor area following Tuesday’s severe storm system and high winds. In order to ensure the safety of line workers and support staff, power must be disconnected for these repairs to be safely completed, which will impact some McGregor residents. To help lessen the potential impact to these customers, the planned outage will occur overnight from approximately midnight through 3:00 a.m. All resources will be fully engaged to complete these repairs as quickly and safely as possible. Oncor appreciates the patience and understanding of our McGregor customers as this critical repair work is completed.
Customers are encouraged to register for My Oncor Alerts to stay informed about planned outages. They can text REG to 66267 or download the My Oncor App.
Follow Madison on social media!

author: @Rigzone
title: ExxonMobil to Lay Off About 250 UK Workers
text:
ExxonMobil to Lay Off About 250 UK Workers
Exxon Mobil Corp. will shrink its UK headcount by about 250 positions as the Texas oil giant consolidates its operations in the country.
Exxon’s longtime Leatherhead office south of London is due to shut in 2026 and employees at that site who will remain at the energy major are expected to relocate to Exxon’s refinery and petrochemical complex in Fawley, according to a statement from the company on Wednesday.
Amid this consolidation of its UK operations, Exxon will continue to hire new people at its London trading hub, which the firm has been trying to expand.
“The UK is an important country for Exxon Mobil,” according to the statement. “We are investing in strong businesses, including growing our London Trading hub and revitalizing our Fawley Petrochemical Complex. We will continue to have a meaningful presence in the country.”

author: VNExplorer
title: Toyota presenta una nueva generación de 4Runner después de 14 años
text: Toyota continúa presentando nuevas generaciones para modelos de enfoque off road. A los ya conocidos Land Cruiser y sus primos de Lexus, ahora le sigue el 4Runner. Un modelo que a 15 años de la presentación de su actual generación, continúa marcando números récord de ventas en Estados Unidos. Esta nueva generación de la 4Runner 2025 llega para mantener viva la leyenda todoterreno del modelo, pero con importantes actualizaciones en diseño, tecnología y rendimiento. Toyota 4Runner 2025 A simple vista, la 4Runner 2025 conserva su esencia robusta y aventurera, con un frontal similar al de la Tacoma, pasos de rueda prominentes y una gran altura sobre el suelo. La tercera ventana lateral llega hasta el techo, rindiendo homenaje a las primeras generaciones del modelo. Además, como ya adelantamos cuando se supo la fecha del lanzamiento, conserva el quinto vidrio eléctrico para disfrutar aún más las escapadas off road. Toyota 4Runner 2025 Sin embargo, bajo la piel, la 4Runner 2025 es completamente nueva. Se basa en la plataforma global TNGA-F de Toyota, compartida con modelos como Tacoma, Land Cruiser, Tundra y Sequoia. Esta plataforma ofrece mayor resistencia, mejora la comodidad de conducción y el comportamiento en carretera. El interior también se ha renovado por completo, con materiales de mayor calidad, un diseño más moderno y una mayor dotación tecnológica. Destaca el tablero digital, la pantalla táctil flotante de 14 pulgadas para el sistema de infoentretenimiento, Apple CarPlay y Android Auto inalámbricos, cargador inalámbrico de celulares y múltiples espacios para guardar objetos. Toyota 4Runner 2025 En cuanto a motorizaciones, la 4Runner 2025 se une a las tendencias del mercado y dice adiós al V6 de 4.0 litros, ofreciendo dos opciones turboalimentadas de cuatro cilindros y 2.4 litros. La primera se denomina i-Force, que produce 278 HP y 430 NM de torque. Esta opción está disponible en las versiones SR5, TRD Sport, TRD Off-Road y Limited. La alternativa más prestacional se denomina i-Force Max, que con ayuda de la hibridación entrega 326 HP y 630 NM de torque. Combina el motor i-Force Turbo con un motor eléctrico de 48 hp. En este caso, está disponible como opción en las versiones TRD Off-Road y Limited, y de serie en las TRD Pro, Trailhunter y Platinum. Toyota 4Runner 2025 La nueva 4Runner 2025 también estrena una suspensión de nueva geometría, con doble horquilla delantera y eje multibrazo trasero. Además, algunas versiones estarán equipadas con amortiguadores Fox QS3 o ARB/Old Man Emu, para un mejor desempeño off-road. Otras novedades de la 4Runner 2025 incluyen elementos como bloqueo de diferencial trasero electrónico de serie en las versiones TRD Off-Road, TRD Pro y Trailhunter. Además de barra estabilizadora delantera desconectable en las versiones TRD Pro y Trailhunter. y completa el combo los múltiples accesorios todoterreno para la versión Trailhunter, como protectores de carrocería, portamaletas ARB, snorkel, barra de luces LED y llantas todoterreno Toyo Open Country de 33 pulgadas. Toyota 4Runner 2025 La Toyota 4Runner 2025 estará disponible en Estados Unidos a partir del segundo semestre de 2024, con precios aún por confirmar. Sin duda, una nueva generación que mantiene la esencia todoterreno del modelo y que se actualiza con las últimas tecnologías y comodidades. ¿Crees que llegue a Chile?News Related - Perfume árabe: la propuesta que toma ventaja para la concesión de Universidad de Concepción Universidad de Concepción vive horas claves.
